actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to credit, in computing length of service for retention purposes in Federal reductions in force, former service performed for agricultural stabilization county committees and associations of producers by Federal employees in any executive department or agency of the Federal Government.

summary.text: Authorizes the crediting, in computing length of service for retention purposes in Federal reductions in force, of former service performed for agricultural stabilization county committees and associations of producers by Federal employees in any executive department of agency of the Federal Government, (presently restricted to those employed by the Department of Agriculture). (Amends 5 U.S.C. 3502(a) )c)).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to credit, in computing length of service for retention purposes in Federal reductions in force, former service performed for agricultural stabilization county committees and associations of producers by Federal employees in any executive department or agency of the Federal Government.
